CustomField.description:
Complete the Planning a Home Visit Checklist link HERE and document the perceived level of risk. If necessary Re-Assess the Level of Risk after talking to the client and making arrangements.
Wherever possible staff should meet the client in a more controlled setting (i.e. workplace) prior to considering a home visit.
